issues.shortMessage: Make this class name end with "Exception".
issues.fullMessage: Adherence to the standard naming conventions makes your code not only more readable, but more usable. For instance, "class FirstAttribute : Attribute" can be used simply with "First", but you must use the full name for "class AttributeOne : Attribute". This rule raises an issue when classes extending "Attribute", "EventArgs", or "Exception", do not end with their parent class names.

properties.title: Attribute, EventArgs, and Exception type names should end with the type being extended
